name: Bullet Hell (Magpie Studios)
description:
Bullet Hell is an 80s/synthwave style bullet hell game made in Unity.

This game is still in the very early stages of development, but it should be in a mostly complete stage in five weeks' time.

Required Specs:

  • macOS High Sierra 10.13+
  • Windows 7 SP1+ or Windows 10
  • Ubuntu 20.4, Ubuntu 18.04, or CentOS 7

This game IS compatible with macOS Big Sur 11 and Apple Silicon Macs.
